data.text:
Our visit to Antalya started on a bad note as our luggage didn’t come from Istanbul. We finally checked  into Megasaray Westbeach without our baggage and sleep deprived (red eye!!) Thankfully the staff at the reception was kind enough to give us a room early. Our expectations were not very high as we found a tray of rotting fruits in our room. They immediately changed it though. 
We kept following up with the airlines for our luggage and the guest relations desk were very helpful. They even called the airlines on our behalf. A big shoutout to Sadaf at the guest relations desk who went out of her way to help us till midnight and we finally got it. She even helped us plan a day trip to the old city. 
The rooms are comfortable and the restaurant and bar are very welcoming. 
The spa is very relaxing. Great hammam and  massages. The hotel has daily entertainment activities and we specifically enjoyed the quiz night. 
The overall experience at the property was amazing.. they made sure we were well looked after. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone planning their trip to Antalya!
data.title: Great hotel with Amazing staff

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear tuleka,

We were very pleased to host you as our guest. We are very happy about your experience and satisfaction with your stay. Thank you for taking your valuable time and sharing your comments with us.
As Megasaray Hotels Family, we look forward to host you again on your next holiday.

Kind Regards,
Eren Ozkaya
CRM Specialist
Megasaray Hotels
owner_response.author: MegasarayCRM

data.text: Everything was perfect at the hotel! the room was perfect for 4 people, the food was great and the people who worked there are very friendly, especially Yusuf who works at the bar was great and super friendly. the cocktails were super delicious!!
data.title: had a really good experience

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Yasemine,
First of all, we would like to thank you for rating our facility high as Megasaray West Beach family. We are also pleased that you are satisfied with the service you receive from our facility and the friendly approach of our staff. I wish to welcome you all again.
Regards
Guest Relations Manager
Aida Karsli
owner_response.author: AİDA KARSLI

data.text: I can’t even begin to tell you how much I loved this hotel and Antalya. The beds were cosy, the room spacious. The buffet is bountiful, and most of all it’s healthy, I’ve stayed in other 5* hotels and the buffets have been mainly junk food, but Megasaray offers a lot of meat, fish and vegetables so you can be full and also in good health. The spa facilities is amazing, I definitely recommend the massages and Turkish bath and relaxing in the sauna/steam room as well. The bartenders are funny and very talented and make amazing cocktails, and let’s not forget that the hotel has its very own patisserie where you can grab a hot or cold coffee and cake. The entertainment is great and honestly I will definitely come back as this hotel is the closest place to heaven. We love you Megasaray, Yasmin & Kim.
data.title: Heaven on Earth!!!!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Yasmin;
Thank you for the nice review; it is very pleasant to meet your needs…
It is a matter of honour to us if you become satisfy from the food, animation, room and room cleaning, staff, service, beach facilities during your stay.
We would be more than happy when we host you and your family again in our hotel.
Yours sincerely,
Aida Karsli 
Guest Relations Manager
owner_response.author: Aida Karslı

data.text: This is our first time in turkey The staff at hotel megasaray exceeded every expectation. Best place we’ve ever stayed. Excellent food, service and amenities. Hotel was very clean and comfortable. Can’t wait to return to hotel. Megasaray!live music was very nice yesterday
data.title: Holiday

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest;
Thank you very much for sharing this constructive and beautiful comment with us.
All comments are very valuable to us. It is a mirror for our development.
We can see you have had a good time in our hotel in general.
We hope we get a chance to welcome you again.
Yours sincerely,
Aida Karsli 
Guest Relations Manager
owner_response.author: Aida Karslı

data.text: We had a lot of fun! This was a great value for money. The pool bar is a massive plus, and the entertainment options are aplenty for families too.  The buffet has a lot options for people with different dietary preferences, including vegetarians. All in all, happily recommend this to anyone looking for a few days away from the hustle & bustle of urban life.
data.title: Great value for money! Very professional.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
We are very happy to hear that we have welcomed you in our hotel in line with the standards and targets of our service quality. Your comment has been shared with all units. We would like to state that we would be happy to host you again at our hotel.
 Best Regards
Guest Relations Manager
Aida Karsli
owner_response.author: Aida Karslı
